name: Wraithcrest
description:
Wraithcrest is a very short FPS tech demo with an emphasis on melee combat built during the 7DFPS competition during 2020 (https://itch.io/jam/7dfps-2020). 

Wraithcrest is inspired by games with gothic settings like Bloodborne, and the primary purpose of the project was to capture the aesthetics for a urban gothic FPS with some gameplay.

Wraithcrest contains 4 melee weapons and 2 ranged weapons to find.

Credits

  • Developed by Wisedawn
  • ReShade 4.8.2 (https://reshade.me/) is used for post-processing
  • The GameGuru engine (https://www.game-guru.com/) was used for making the game
